name: The Hidden Pool of Hampstead Heath
magical_description: Deep within Hampstead Heath lies a pool that only appears at dawn and dusk, when the light is neither day nor night.
what_to_look_for: Look for the ancient oak tree with silver bark that seems to shimmer. The pool appears in its shadow when you whisper 'Show me wonder.'

name: The Whispering Gallery Secret Door
magical_description: In St. Pauls Cathedral famous Whispering Gallery, there is one stone that whispers back.
what_to_look_for: Find the stone that feels warm when all others are cool. It has a tiny carving of a feather.

name: The Time Garden of Greenwich
magical_description: Where the Prime Meridian crosses through Greenwich Park, there grows a garden where each flower blooms in a different season.
what_to_look_for: Stand exactly on the meridian line at sunset. Look for flowers that should not be blooming in the current season.
